  "description": "Linkora Networks - the Internet Service Provision section of the business offers unlimited internet with no data cap through fiber Broadband or fixed wireless. Serving businesses of all types and residential users, we provide you with a more affordable and secure broadband connection. We are currently deploying Fiber-to-the-Home Internet to several homes, estates, and residential buildings along our catchment areas.

We are a fast-growing startup focused on deploying Fiber to the Home (FTTH) solutions to bring high-speed internet to homes and small businesses. Our mission is to revolutionize connectivity by delivering reliable, fast, and affordable fiber internet services to underserved areas.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Makerter
Job Location:&nbsp;Ikorodu, Lagos
Employment Type: Contract

Job Overview


	We are seeking enthusiastic and driven Sales Marketers to join our team. As a Sales Marketer, your primary responsibility is to market our FTTH solutions to potential customers, build relationships, and drive subscriber growth.
	This is an exciting opportunity for self-motivated individuals who are eager to launch their careers in tech and telecommunications.


Key Responsibilities


	Market and promote FTTH internet packages to residential and small business customers
	Identify customer needs and recommend the right internet solutions
	Generate leads through field visits, digital marketing, referrals, and community engagement
	Follow up on prospects and close sales effectively
	Participate in promotional events, door-to-door campaigns, and local activations
	Gather customer feedback to help improve service offerings
	Maintain records of sales and customer interactions


Requirements


	0&ndash;2 years of work experience in sales, marketing, or customer engagement
	Minimum of OND or B.Sc. in any discipline
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills
	Confidence, energy, and willingness to approach people
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team
	Basic understanding of internet services or a willingness to learn
	Field sales or telecom experience is a plus but not required.


Salary


	N70,000 - N150,000 per month.&nbsp;


What We Offer:


	Competitive base salary with commission and performance bonuses
	Training and career development opportunities
	Dynamic and supportive work environment
	Opportunity to grow with a tech-forward startup


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to:&nbsp;info@linkora.com.ng&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",
